title: woah, again.
content:
Wow--even your USERNAME is in all lowercase.

MegaKeen, please, slow down. This is a message board, not a chat room. There's no need to string together so many words without any punctuation, capitalization, or structure. Look at things from an outsider's perspective. If you were someone else, reading the posts you've made so far, what would you think of the individual who wrote them?

Please take the time to form complete sentences, with a capital letter at the beginning and some sort of punctuation at the end. Content itself comes later; let's start with the basics.

title: Re: canceled
content: I gotta tell you, this, so far, does not sound the slightest bit like a Commander Keen game.  I'm not familiar with FPS maker, but bear in mind that the FPS genre really doesn't fit with Commander Keen, which is really not oriented around killing stuff.  You need an engine that will provide, among other things, the ability to jump.  That is INTEGRAL to Keenesque gameplay.[img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]
